title: iCyan Studio
description: Welcome to the iCyan studio. This is a personal website and portfolio to showcase my work, skills, and experience. I am a software engineer with a strong passion for building projects and websites with AI. If you have any questions or would like to work together, feel free to get in touch.

intro.description: Hi, I'm Toyofumi, a software engineer with a strong passion for building projects and websites with AI. I enjoy turning ideas into functional and user-friendly applications.

1.title: Full-Stack Web Development
1.description: Proficient in building responsible design websites with HTML5/CSS and Nextjs/React

2.title: Automation
2.description: Expert in leveraging AI-Driven tools to automate repetitive tasks and streamline processes

3.title: Mobile Development
3.description: Skilled in developing apps for both Android and iOS devices

4.title: Database Management
4.description: Competent in managing databases using SQL (NoSQL, SQLite) and optimizing their performance

5.title: Cloud & DevOps
5.description: Proficient in deploying applications on cloud platforms like AWS (Amplify), GCP, and implementing CI/CD pipelines
